Posted By: Bob Scherer
I have several lots of tobacco cards listed on eBay right now.  Mayo's, Allen & Ginter's, etc etc.  Some will end in less than 24 hrs.  Please check them out.  Here is a link:

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&rd=1&item=130189298330&ssPageName=STRK:MESE:IT&ih=003[/url]

These are all ungraded cards.  I am selling them for a consignor who collected tobacco cards for 50+ years.  Baseball, Boxing, "Buffalo Bill" Cody, etc etc.  Check them out.  My eBay username is 'robertscherer'

Posted By: leon
Welcome to our forum. If you have things for sale on ebay, or other auctions, we do have a seperate category, about 5-6 below this one, for auction sales...ebay and others.....In the future if you could be so kind to put them in that category we would appreciate it...and it's part of the rules. No big deal we just try to keep things somewhat organized........good luck with them....
